item.title: America's Best Idea - Part 2 #TidyTuesday!
item.description: Update: After getting some great feedback on twitter from the #rstats community I was able to make a few tweaks to improve the racing bar chart. I’d like to thank @CedScherer who pointed me to this great Github repo and @JonTheGeek who directed me to last weeks #TidyTuesday podcast Racing Bar Chart!!! For #tidytuesday we’re looking at America’s National Parks! I have already blogged about how much I love the Nation Park System, so this is perfect.
